pkgmetadata.longdescription: GeoDjango speaks the languages of the geographic web and supports KML, GML, WKT, WKB, GeoRSS, and GeoJSON formats. Web maps may be created using the APIs for Google Maps and OpenLayers. Moreover, the built-in geographic admin supports the manipulation and visualization of spatial data. Databrowse dynamically creates a rich, browsable web site by introspecting your models.
